description:
Mitsuki and Yuuya are both locked in the bathroom naked?! The one who saved them was Kiritani Yukina, aka "Yuki-nee", Yuuya`s childhood friend who moved back in next door. With the appearance of a powerful rival who`s an older woman, a childhood friend, and has big breasts unlike Mitsuki, Hiyori panics.
Source: crunchyroll
